answers.answer: I have all those symptoms too plus high blood pressure. I have a 5 year old daughter, had preeclampsia first time and looks like I may develop it again. I still exercise daily! Yoga can help relieve some of those symptoms plus ensure you put your feet higher than your head for 30 mins to help swelling insure feet. I sleep with a frozen hot water bottle to help my hot swollen feet at night. It's amazing during summer which has just finished here - I live in New Zealand

Thats SPD, i have that one. when i change sides at night it is painful...you can take short walks in the morning if it hurts and u want to be active. Exercise gets ur blood circulating. I do exercise and run and 28 weeks pregnant, just uncomfy coz im getting heavier. So its weird..uhmm also,  drink lots of water. And when u sit, elevate ur legs.

question: My third trimester is so far going so difficult..I don't know what will happen in coming weeks...I have swollen feets,pain in legsPressure and pain in vaginal region,which is increasing day by day..because of which I cannot sleep whole night, the moment I think to change my side,it is extremely painful and demands lots of efforts for doing so..Just let me know ladies,can I do some exercise to be active? Or just take rest because of these symptoms?These symptoms making me an old lady.super slow :((
title: swollen feets.. still exercise??
